SA15jithettu:1: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tv ātmasaṃvide //
SA15jithettu:3: 2. vādinā svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭo 'rthaḥ sādhyaḥ / sādhyate yena tat sādhanam /
SA15jithettu:7: sapakṣa eva sattvam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam /

SA15jithettu:178: atra paramāṇor vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntatvād amūrtatvaṃ sādhanadharmo vyāvṛtto [Htu_269] mūrtatvāt paramāṇūnām /
SA15jithettu:187: atrākāśādau vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca na vyāvṛttam //

SA15jithettu:200: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahau saṃbhavataḥ [Htu_270] yathā ṛṣabhavardhamānāder iti /
